Hero.title: I am a Web Developer and Frontend Engineer based in Brazil
Hero.description: For over 10 years combining design and programming to transform ideas into innovative digital products.

Projects.title: iSolve Funding Management Platform
Projects.shortDescription: Project created with Vue.js, Sass and TypeScript.
Projects.longDescription: iSolve is a real estate financing and home equity management platform that serves more than 1,500 real estate agencies and independent consultants. It was developed using Vue.js, Vuetify, Vuex, Vuetify, Sass and TypeScript, using various resources such as JWT, OAuth, WebSocket.
Projects.myWork: I was responsible for developing the User Interface and implementing most of the features. Additionally, I collaborated on the creation of the Design System, as well as defining the architecture and conducting tests.

Projects.title: QuintoAndar Credit Experience
Projects.shortDescription: Project using React, Redux and TypeScript
Projects.longDescription: The user credit flow is one of the main end-user experiences, covering the entire credit application and analysis process, document authentication and user profile evaluation. It is a micro front-end, developed in React, Redux, TypeScript.
Projects.myWork: I worked as Squad's main Front-End developer. I was responsible for implementing the document authentication flow, using external SDKs such as Unico and IDWall, I was also responsible for creating a dashboard that centralized all errors from all applications in our flow, to improve Crash Free, creating an impeccable flow for the end user.

Projects.title: Instacarro Price Guide
Projects.shortDescription: InstaCarro is an online platform that is revolutionizing...
Projects.longDescription: InstaCarro is an online platform that is revolutionizing the used car industry in Brazil, helping people who want to sell their cars as quickly as possible. The Pricing Guide was developed using React, ContextAPI, Custom Hooks, React Query and TypeScript.
Projects.myWork: I was responsible for defining the architecture, creating the prototype in collaboration with the product team and developing a SPA (Single Page Application) using React and TypeScript, with integration to several microservices. Furthermore, my mission included optimizing performance, applying advanced settings to ensure the best possible experience for the end user.

Projects.title: Ewally Aplicação Web Responsiva
Projects.shortDescription: Projeto utilizando WordPress, ACF, Hooks, WP-CLI
Projects.longDescription: A Ewally oferece Soluções financeiras inovadoras, ágeis e seguras para a sua empresa. O Web App é desenvolvido em HTML, CSS, WordPress como CMS.
Projects.myWork: Fui responsável transformar o protótipo criado pela UX/UI em um tema leve e performático usando WordPress, HTML, CSS, Hooks, etc...

Features.title: About
Features.description: Learn a little more about me.

About.title: Hi!.My name is Renato Khael.
About.description: I've been working with HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript since 2010, and for the past 5 years, I've specialized in React, Vue.js, and TypeScript. This experience allows me to integrate design and development, creating high-performance and scalable user-focused applications.

Portfolio.title: Web Development and UX/UI Design Services
Portfolio.description: Meet my agency specializing in website development, landing pages, e-commerce. High standard UI design. Check out some of the projects I had the pleasure of developing.

Contact.title: contact
Contact.description: I’m interested in freelance opportunities. However, if you have other request or question, don’t hesitate to contact me

AboutPage.title: Software engineer passionate about UX/UI Design
AboutPage.sub-title: Aprimorando a Navegação com Design Intuitivo
AboutPage.description: Software Engineer with a focus on Frontend and UX/UI, combining design skills with solid technical knowledge. With over 10 years of experience in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, and more than 5 years working with React, Vue.js, and TypeScript, I am uniquely positioned to integrate design and development, creating high-performing and scalable user-focused applications.
